title: Wear HelloGitHub Badge
description: Showcase the recognition of your open-source project and help promote and operate it
top_text: This is a program to claim your open-source project. By claiming a project and wearing the HelloGitHub badge, you can showcase the community recognition and recommendation your project has received, highlighting the honor of your open-source project. At the same time, claim your open-source project to enjoy more recommendations and benefits from the community.

copy.warning: Badge is being generated, please try again later

submit.check_fail: Please enter the correct README filename!
submit.check_fail2: This project has not been included yet, please submit it first.
submit.check_fail3: This repository has already been claimed!
submit.success: Congratulations! Your submission was successful. Please wait for community verification.
submit.fail: Verification failed! Please check the README filename and code integrity.
submit.fail2: Verification failed! Please check the network and README filename.

rights.item1: Community Recognition: The badge signifies that your project has passed HelloGitHub community's rigorous selection and received a recommendation.
rights.item2: Increased Exposure: Completing the claim (wearing the badge) will get more recommendation traffic, attracting potential users and contributors.
rights.item3: Interaction Opportunities: Users can quickly understand your project through the badge and engage with the community by liking, commenting, and favoriting.
rights.item4: Feedback Accumulation: Collect genuine feedback from a wide range of users to continuously optimize your project.
rights.item5: Author Identification: After verification, your comments will display a prominent identifier and receive comment pinning.

howto.title: How to Claim an Open Source Project
howto.step1: Confirm that your project has been included by the HelloGitHub community, then click
howto.step2: Find a suitable position in your project's README file and paste the copied code, then submit the changes.
howto.step3: After completing wearing the badge, enter your project's README filename:
howto.step4: Enjoy more recommendations and benefits once your project is approved by the HelloGitHub team.

question.title: Frequently Asked Questions
question.item1: Permissions: Only the project author or contributors with modification rights can claim the project. Please ensure you have sufficient permissions to proceed.
question.item2: Verification Failed: Only projects already included in the community can be claimed. If your project has not been included, please submit it first.
question.item3: Each project can only be claimed once: Once verified, the claimer of the project cannot be changed. Please carefully check all information before proceeding.
question.item4: Need Help: Contact me via email at: 595666367@qq.com.
